thread.title: Online Brokerage Folio Investing to Offer NextShares
thread.title_full: Online Brokerage Folio Investing to Offer NextShares - WSJ

author: Daisy Maxey
title: Online Brokerage Folio Investing to Offer NextShares
text:
Online brokerage services Folio Investing and Folio Institutional plan to offer a new type of fund created by a unit of Eaton Vance Corp. that may start trading later this year.
The NextShares funds, to be offered by Eaton Vance itself as well as other asset managers, have characteristics of both mutual funds and exchange-traded funds.
Folio parent Foliofn Inc., based in McLean, Va., is the first brokerage firm that Eaton Vance... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
